# HttpContentSerializer.Combine method

Combines HTTP content serializers.

```csharp
public static HttpContentSerializer Combine(params HttpContentSerializer[] contentSerializers)
```

## Remarks

The first content serializer is preferred, but subsequent content serializers will be used as needed to satisfy the desired media type.
